forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 62F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy this evening. Fog developing late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy this evening. Fog developing late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 18C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 64F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 17C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 64F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 14C. S winds at 40 to 55 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 58F. S winds at 25 to 35 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High near 15C. Winds S at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High near 60F. Winds S at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 63F. E winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.
